snippet: The No. 1 American cellphone carrier continued to do well in its first quarter, even as it has gradually raised prices of phone plans.
abstract: Verizon Communications reports first-quarter net income of $1.95 billion, or 68 cents a share, up 15.8 percent from same period year earlier; profit is driven largely by growth in company's wireless business; revenue climbs 4.2 percent to $29.4 billion.
lead_paragraph: The No. 1 American cellphone carrier continued to do well in its first quarter, even as it has gradually raised prices of phone plans.
